name: ark-asa-backup-web
description: ARK: Survival Ascended Backup Manager - Monorepo Root

scripts.build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:client && pnpm run clean:server
scripts.lint:client: pnpm --filter client run format:check && pnpm --filter client exec tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:server: pnpm --filter server run format:check && pnpm --filter server exec tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:all: pnpm run lint:client && pnpm run lint:server
scripts.format:all: pnpm run format:client && pnpm run format:server
